sections.text:
81-829.31.Adjutant General; Emergency Management Act; administer.

There is hereby created in the office of the Adjutant General the Nebraska Emergency Management Agency. The Adjutant General shall administer the Emergency Management Act.

SourceLaws 1953, c. 336, ยง 2, p. 1106;Laws 1996, LB 43, ยง 16.

Cross ReferencesEmergency Management Act, see section 81-829.36.For provisions relating to the Adjutant General, see section 55-101 et seq.Vital resource emergency, see sections 84-162 to 84-167.
